mapper.select: select boardnum , title , memberid from merukari_board where soldout = 'N' order by boardnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into merukari_board( boardnum , memberid , title , contents , category) values( merukari_board_seq.nextval , #{memberid} , #{title} , #{contents} , #{category})
mapper.select: select boardnum , memberid , to_char(inputdate, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') inputdate , title , contents from merukari_board where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.delete: delete from merukari_board where boardnum = #{boardnum} and memberid = #{memberid}
mapper.select:
select * from merukari_board
category = #{category}
and
title like '%' || #{title} || '%'
order by boardnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into market_reply( replynum , boardnum , memberid , replytext) values ( market_reply_seq.nextval , #{boardnum} , #{memberid} , #{replytext})
